Previous: tāNext: tāv

√tāy 'stretch'

[present: [1.] tāyate  ]

perfect: tatāye  tāyāṃ  carkre?  

[aorist: atāyi  atāyiṣṭa  tāyiṣyate  tāyitā  ]

secondary: passive: tāyyámāna  

Very questionable forms. The JB. manuscript reads (iii. 177) anusaṃtāyāyāṃ cakre. Belongs probably in some way to √tan, tā. The bhāgavata- purāna has once tāyitā (periph. fut.), which is given above under √tan.
